TopicTitle: [0.23.5] StretchySRB: A StretchyTanks Continuation v9 Final Pre-PP edition 3/21/14

Articles.Content:
drtedastro: when I get a chance I'll at least get Firespitter's texture switcher working for PF. I'm away on a trip so I can't get much done at the moment though.

Got it working for Procedural Wings so I'm learning.

O

Ultra cool.... thanks

So I kind of updated a bit and did some stuff.

I added more folders for easy deletion for unneeded textures.

Thanks to Nathan's wisdom, I did some improvements:

A little more kosmos like texture.

The tank end is new. But the other side is derped. I also changed the texture to the non-loopy one and added another variant

Added failtacular Shuttle Engines mod tank textures.

Now you can try and build your own Jupiter Direct Project with tanks as long as you want without model/texture cuts... maybe

Also added a formal screen for the station texture:

EDIT: Forgot the LINK

Why can the tanks not be filled with electric charge?

Why can the tanks not be filled with electric charge?

First of only the Service Module Stretchy Tanks can hold electric charge (I mean electricity isn't a liquid so it can't be stored in a normal fuel tank) and you need either Modular Fuel Tanks or Real Fuels

Okay then rest well (you probably already do haha ) and then give me this SRB

I thought everything that would open zip can open rar ._.

RAR, as popular as it is in some communities, is not a cross-industry common standard like ZIP and requires installing third-party software. ZIP really is what should be used for distribution when only one format is offered, because it's safe to assume that anyone can open it.

I do have RAR capability, but do appreciate you offering a ZIP.

Edited February 5, 2014 by RoboRay

Nope. Welding wrecks Procedural Stuff. To make skirts, simply clip long beams and put a procedural ring in there. Skirts should be made by the fairing and shaped bu the toroidal tank inside it which also looks like the shuttle's srb.

Anyways I tried making a castor texture. Here's the result:

Bring on the vacuum SRBs *SRB sounds*

Another thing I realized is why can't we have resizable SRB nozzles according to thrust etc or something like that.

Anyways I seem to be updating the textures a lot. I also added bump maps for other stuff (and planning on others-Kosmos specially. We'll get there)

Focused on SRBs/Shuttle Engine Textures. Minimal difference but tried what I can.

Again: There are no new models, just a bit of twiddle diddle... Let's leave awesome stuff to Nathan.

Here goes the zip
